topics.title: Create a blog
topics.description:
In this last session, you have to create an article with a title and a minimum of two paragraphs including two images in which one image should be clickable and should be redirected to the google page using this link “https://google.com”. While creating an article the following fields must be included:
a. One title
b. Minimum 2 paragraphs “lorem” text is fine
c. One table
d. One un ordered list

topics.title: Create student form
topics.description:
Create a student data form with the following features :
a. Name and label must be given
b. Create a form to collect students data by using the sections name, email, phone, address, class, division, father name and mother name. 
c. In the class section use a choice field from class 1st to class 10th and in the division section use the choice field as division A, B and C.

topics.title: Create a product table
topics.description:
In this practise section you need to create a table with following features:
a. The table must have 100% width
b. 7 columns with titles as Name, Category, Discount, Cost, Price, Quantity and Total
c. Include not more than 5 datas
d. At the bottom of the table it should show the Total Value and display the total sum of the Quantity and Total. 
e. The sum of the Quantity and Total must be in bold.

topics.title: Create a Profile Website
topics.description:
Create a portfolio by giving the following features :
a. Name or title for the portfolio
b. An about paragraph
c. Display an image 
d. Give a button, when clicked should go to the Google page.

topics.title: Wibbitz Website
topics.description: In this practice section, you need to create an entire website of wibbitz.

topics.title: Website spotlight
topics.description:
In this practice session, you need to create a spotlight on a normal website. This spotlight section includes a header section in which a logo is placed, background image, h1, h2 and a paragraph.

The asset will be given in the Design folder, in which you need to upload your work file.

topics.title: Main section of a website
topics.description: In this practice,  we will create a main section of the website. Compared to other websites in this main section that ul-li elements arrangements are in a different order.

topics.title: Shake website spotlight
topics.description: In this practice session, you need to create a home section of the Shake website. Some additional features will be shown in this website, which you will learn in detail this video.

topics.title: Rental space website spotlight
topics.description: In this practice session, you needs to create a home section of a rental space website which contains a background portion, header and spotlight sections.
topics.remarks: height 100vh koduthilla, input style cheythath propper alla

topics.title: Create header
topics.description: In this practice, you need to create a header section of a website. For that take a 90% width of the header tag and within it, you should include a logo in the left and on the right side give navigational menus.

topics.title: Create a gallery
topics.description: In this practice, you will learn to create a gallery grid using flex method. In order to start you need to create a section id gallery and then apply a list of images.

topics.title: Arrange a section using flexbox
topics.description: This practice section may include creating a website by using flexbox method. There is a spotlight section, the middle section which contains section class-left and section class-right, gallery section and footer.

topics.title: Create a spotlight with background
topics.description: In this practice, you need to create a spotlight section with background

topics.title: Article website
topics.description:
In this practise session you need to learn an article page. This page may contain an image section, a title and a paragraph related to it. The paragraph has some elements of bold words, italic words and bold-italics words. 

You can give any number of sentences or words to your paragraph. There is no word limit for this practise section. The only rule is that, you should specify the above-mentioned elements in your article page.
